thread.title: Justin Bieber gets good remarks from probation officer in egging case
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber gets good remarks from probation officer in egging case | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Justin Bieber gets good remarks from probation officer in egging case
text:
Other Articles Study sheds light on culinary habits of Stonehenge builders 'Fantasy Island' to get reboot with female protagonist Leonardo DiCaprio to make movie on Volkswagen scandal Justin Bieber recently met his probation officer at the Santa Monica courthouse and it looked good.
According to TMZ, the 21-year-old has got good remarks from the probation officer and is required to do five days of community labor for the egging case.
Earlier, Bieber had posted videos of himself painting a wall at the Youth Gang Intervention Center as a part of the community labor.
 15, 2015 12:45 am
